# Introduction This is a book created from markdown and executable code. ::::: {.content-hidden unless-format="html"} Will only appear in HTML :::: aside ::: {.callout-note collapse="true"} # Uwaga To jest przykładowy callout w sekcji bocznej. ::: :::: ::::: See @knuth84 for additional discussion of literate programming. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} 1 + 1 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 2 ``` ::: ::: ## Interactivity Test ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ## Test cross reference See @fig-obraz2 for an illustration [Skocz do koniec](#koniec) ## Test list of figures \listoffigures ## Rozdział kolejny Test tabeli 1 2 3 | Col1 | Col2 | Col3 | |------|------|------| | 1 | 2 | 3 | | 1 | 2 | 3 | | 3 | 3 | 3 | ## Test sekcji Poniżej RAW content z HTML ## Rozdział drugi Drugi rozdział ### Trzeci podrozdział Trzeci itd.. You can also do this on a per-format basis (if for example you want to provide a higher resolution image for EPUB and a lower resolution image for HTML to reduce download time). For example: [By "right format", we mean that the data is tidy, and ready to be summarised and graphed.]{.aside} Quarto Pub is a free publishing service for content created with Quarto. Quarto Pub is ideal for blogs, course or project websites, books, presentations, and personal hobby sites. It’s important to note that all documents and sites published to Quarto Pub are publicly visible. You should only publish content you wish to share publicly. ::: {.callout-caution collapse="true"} Tu znajduje się zwijana sekcja w boxie callout typu caution ::: ::: callout-tip Altair is based on Vega-Lite, a high-level grammar of interactive graphics ::: Właściwe linki i tu przykładowy odnośnik do mojej \[\[books\]\] książek ::: callout-note A tu znajduje się callout note ::: > Cytacik lub wcięcie takie coś... If you haven’t published to Quarto Pub before, the publish command will prompt you to authenticate. After confirming that you want to publish, your content will be rendered and deployed, and then a browser opened to view your site. A jeśli chcemy umieścić kod to możemy to zrobić przy użyciu takiej dyrektywy jak poniżej. Może być ona też zwijana i rozwijana. To się określa w konigu yaml/ ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) penguins <- read.csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-07-28/penguins.csv')%>% drop_na() head(penguins) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` species island bill_length_mm bill_depth_mm flipper_length_mm body_mass_g 1 Adelie Torgersen 39.1 18.7 181 3750 2 Adelie Torgersen 39.5 17.4 186 3800 3 Adelie Torgersen 40.3 18.0 195 3250 4 Adelie Torgersen 36.7 19.3 193 3450 5 Adelie Torgersen 39.3 20.6 190 3650 6 Adelie Torgersen 38.9 17.8 181 3625 sex year 1 male 2007 2 female 2007 3 female 2007 4 female 2007 5 male 2007 6 female 2007 ``` ::: ::: We've removed missing values here, which means that the data has 333 rows now\[\^1\]. Ten indeks górny przypis \^1 coś nie chce zabanglać If you have an existing Quarto Pub site that you want to publish to, you should manually create a \_publish.yml file that looks like the example above, but with the appropriate id and url values for your site. ![Właściwy opis wykresu](graph1.png){.lightbox width="300"} ### Podział na dwie kolumny Poniżej demo jak podzielić przestrzeń na 2 kolumny ::: {layout-ncol="2"} ![Właściwy opis wykresu](graph1.png){#fig-obraz1 .lightbox width="300"} ![Właściwy opis wykresu](graph2.png){#fig-obraz2 .lightbox width="300"} ::: ::::: columns ::: {.column width="50%"} The average bill length is 43.9927928 mm and the average bill depth is 17.1648649 mm. ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} The data was collected between 2007 and 2009 ::: ::::: ### Zewnętrzne źródło ::: {#fig-elephant} Elephant ::: ### Dyrektywa na całą szerokość ::: column-page ![](elephant.jpg) ::: ### Dyrektywa na całe okno ::: column-screen ![A full screen image](elephant.jpg) ::: Dodatkowo szerokości ::: {.cell .column-page} ```{.r .cell-code} knitr::kable( mtcars[1:6, 1:10] ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} | | mpg| cyl| disp| hp| drat| wt| qsec| vs| am| gear| |:-----------------|----:|---:|----:|---:|----:|-----:|-----:|--:|--:|----:| |Mazda RX4 | 21.0| 6| 160| 110| 3.90| 2.620| 16.46| 0| 1| 4| |Mazda RX4 Wag | 21.0| 6| 160| 110| 3.90| 2.875| 17.02| 0| 1| 4| |Datsun 710 | 22.8| 4| 108| 93| 3.85| 2.320| 18.61| 1| 1| 4| |Hornet 4 Drive | 21.4| 6| 258| 110| 3.08| 3.215| 19.44| 1| 0| 3| |Hornet Sportabout | 18.7| 8| 360| 175| 3.15| 3.440| 17.02| 0| 0| 3| |Valiant | 18.1| 6| 225| 105| 2.76| 3.460| 20.22| 1| 0| 3| ::: ::: ## Koniec dokumentu {#koniec} ### Koniec strony Przed przerwą {{< pagebreak >}} Umieszczamy informacje takie a takie
